ygData.subject: Re: Fed up with EQ - any ideas??
ygData.msgSnippet: lol before I left, I died out somewhere I didnt know and I lost my plate helm. btw im a caster... hehe anyways, I set out to find my corpse. then I lost my
ygData.messageBody:
lol before I left, I died out somewhere I didnt know and I lost my plate
helm. btw im a caster... hehe
anyways, I set out to find my corpse. then I lost my plate wristbands....
then i started cursing AC, and I looked around and yelled free stuf, ran up
to someone, gave him my breastplate, staff, wand, spell reagents, and the
rest of my armor and hes like "wow hehe thanks" and then I said back to EQ,
and let him know he can find more plate on the road in a few mins.
It was so easy to get the plate... exit main character, start a new
vagabond, sell all the stuff drop the 400 pyreals (thats what theyre called,
right?) then log in as main character delete vagabond start over. I got rich
doing that alot

Fammuin, level 16 Erudite Cleric, Erollisi Marr
Fabno Licious <Warriors of Apocalypse>, level 22 Erudite Enchanter, Erollisi
Marr


----- Original Message -----
From: Whitmore, Lance <lwhitmore@...>
To: <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, October 26, 1999 3:19 PM
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Fed up with EQ - any ideas??


> From: "Whitmore, Lance" <lwhitmore@...>
>
> I have to agree with you on AC.. I'm part beta program, however i rarely
> play it now.. its neat when you first start playing.. then you find out
that
> the game just sucks.. :) cant put it any other way. Graphics are ok..
but
> the world is so large and the distance between them is almost unbearable.
> Its really annoying running for what seems forever, then losing your best
> item you spent all your loot on miles from where you last bound yourself.
> Hehe.. The AC world is so empty, almost as empty as their dungeons. :)
>
> For those that don't know.. when you die in AC you temporary lose some of
> your stat numbers and.. your best item. This item.. which is now
> available to anyone walking by. nice aye. EQ example... One minute you
> have your rubi tunic, when you return to your corpse you find that a level
1
> guy is now sporting your hard earned tunic.. Welcome to AC. hehe
>
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Shane Bole [mailto:shane0009@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, October 27, 1999 2:57 AM
> To: EverQuest@onelist.com; kaleusi@...
> Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Fed up with EQ - any ideas??
>
>
> From: "Shane Bole" <shane0009@...>
>
> AC and UO both suck ass. You should have tried ac last week during open
> beta. I logged in and ran around for a while.. It seemed ok but all the
> things I thought that were nice about it later on sucked
> its annoying as hell plus the graphics suck, monster AI is sucky so you
can
> solo your whole way to the top without getting hurt for 1 point of damage
>
> Fammuin, level 16 Erudite Cleric, Erollisi Marr
> Fabno Licious <Warriors of Apocalypse>, level 22 Erudite Enchanter,
Erollisi
> Marr
>
>
